name: A bloody squid-like tentacle
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution slightly.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
A death in the realm causes changes in its effects.
